name: Garden Battle (vincentwelax, StalemateZ, NaCl586)
description:
Garden Battle is a local PVP where player fight each other on collecting fruits and sabotage other teams using pests. Each player must plant trees on the plots given and nurture them in order for the trees to bear fruit. The player with the highest score wins!

How to play:
  • Players are divided into 2: Player 1 and Player 2
  • Each player must plant their own tree seeds in the plots given
  • Plants might be watered or fertilized, use the watering can and fertilizer to fulfill the requests of each plant (if plant requests are not fulfilled they will die):
  • Players can sabotage each other's plants by using the bug:
  • Players can protect their plants against bugs using the bug spray:
  • Eventually, the trees will grow and bear fruit:
  • Collect the fruits and store them in the fruit basket to gain points and win the game by having the most points:
Controls:Player 1:

W, A, S, D: Movement

Left shift: Pickup items, use items, harvest fruits, collect fruits inside the basket

Player 2:

Up arrow key, Left arrow key, Right arrow key, Down arrow key: Movement

Right shift: Pickup items, use items, harvest fruits, collect fruits inside the basket
